SELECT q.totq, rep.totrep, b.totb, f.totf, rec.totrec, rev.totrev, m.totm, m.newm, u.post, u.reply, e.tote, fun.price FROM (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totq FROM QNA WHERE TO_CHAR(QNA_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))q, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totrep FROM REPORT_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(REPORT_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))rep, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totb FROM BLOCK_STATUS WHERE TO_CHAR(B_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))b, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totf FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(FREE_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))f, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totrec FROM RECOMMEND_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(RECOMM_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))rec, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totrev FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(REVIEW_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))rev, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS totm FROM MEMBER)m, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS newm FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_REG_DATE >= TO_CHAR(sysdate-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))m, (SELECT nvl(SUM(num_rows), 0) AS post FROM user_tables WHERE table_name LIKE '%BOARD%') u, (SELECT nvl(SUM(num_rows), 0) AS reply FROM user_tables WHERE table_name LIKE '%REPLY%') u, (SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) AS tote FROM exhibition WHERE trunc(exh_startdate, 'mm') = trunc(sysdate, 'mm'))e, (SELECT nvl(SUM(funding_price), 0) AS price FROM CROWDFUNDING)fun
